name: Winter Flurry
flavorText: The power of the cold death of winter is not something to be taken lightly.
flavorTextHtml: The power of the cold death of winter is not something to be taken lightly.

primary.textHtml: Cold skills deal [15 - 20]% more damage.

secondary.textHtml: Enemies killed by Cold damage have a 25% chance to release a Frost Nova. Your Hydras deals 135% increased damage to enemies in a Blizzard. [125 - 150]%
